name: RECHARGE aisbl
goal: RECHARGE (a non profit organization) has been founded to promote the value of advanced rechargeable batteries and represent the interests of all its members in the chain of battery life.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Batteries Directive, REACH, WEEE, ROHS, Product Environment Footprint initiative, EIP Raw Materials initiative, Ecodesign, Ecolabel, Sustainable energy Policy
